channel.title: Missing File
channel.description:
I have downloaded an Auto-Script which uses Scar, it's telling me that it cannot find AutoRespond.scar and I've checked my SRL folders and it's not there.. And also.. in the script im trying to run it mentions nowhere include AutoRespond.scar
Sorry if this question has been answered however my search is not working :|

item.title: Missing File

item.description:

donnu where u got that version of SRL but you need to download the latest version for sure… v3.0 is out now with 3.1 being released in the next day or to goto www.villu-reborn.com for the offical srl forums…
